name: Out of Controls (Brirro)
description: This was a game I made in about 6 hours for the GMTK game jam, I took the theme "Out of Control" in a way so you start with only the ability to jump, and as you beat more levels you unlock more controls. I had more ideas for the game, but work got in the way. I would recommend playing the game in full screen mode. If you need to restart a level there is an option in the pause menu by hitting 'esc'
